title: Beef Nachos with Ranchitas Nacho Queso
ingredients: ½ cup mozzarella or cheddar cheese (for melting)
1 family-size bag of Ranchitas Nacho Queso
instructions: Step 1. Season the ground beef with salt and pepper.
Step 2. Heat the oil in a skillet and cook the beef until fully browned.
Step 3. Add the sofrito criollo and mix well. Pour in the water and cook gently until the beef mixture is slightly saucy.
Step 4. In a separate bowl, combine the tomato, onion, and cilantro. Set aside.
Step 5. Place the Ranchitas Nacho Queso on a serving plate, then top with a generous portion of beef.
Step 6. Sprinkle with cheese and melt it in the microwave until bubbly.
Step 7. Finish by topping with the tomato, onion, and cilantro mixture. Serve immediately.
